_comment: Unique items have FIXED stats and identities. They enable specific builds. Chase items for endgame.

void_reaper.name: Void Reaper
void_reaper.description: Shots pass through all enemies. Each pierce adds +8% damage.
void_reaper.flavor: The void consumes all in its path.

supernova_catalyst.name: Supernova Catalyst
supernova_catalyst.description: Every 5th shot explodes in a 200px AoE. Crit chance +15%.
supernova_catalyst.flavor: Stars die so that you may kill.

phantom_gatling.name: Phantom Gatling
phantom_gatling.description: Fire rate doubles when below 30% HP. +50% crit damage.

aegis_of_eternity.name: Aegis of Eternity
aegis_of_eternity.description: Shield regenerates 3× faster. Taking fatal damage restores 25% shield (60s cooldown).

null_barrier.name: Null Barrier
null_barrier.description: Absorb projectiles to charge. At full charge, release a damage nova. +120 shield.
null_barrier.flavor: What they throw at you becomes your weapon.

warp_drive_mk9.name: Warp Drive Mk.IX
warp_drive_mk9.description: +45% speed. Leaves a damage trail that hurts enemies.
warp_drive_mk9.flavor: The fastest ship in the sector... and the deadliest contrail.

quantum_blink.name: Quantum Blink Engine
quantum_blink.description: Dash makes you invulnerable for 0.5s. +30% speed, +10% dodge.
quantum_blink.flavor: You were here. Now you're not.

fusion_heart.name: Fusion Heart
fusion_heart.description: All damage +20%. Energy regen +30%. Overheats for 2s every 15s (no firing).

dark_matter_core.name: Dark Matter Core
dark_matter_core.description: Enemies within 200px take 5% max HP/sec. You take 1% max HP/sec. +40% damage.
dark_matter_core.flavor: The abyss gives freely. It also takes.

swarm_commander.name: Swarm Commander
swarm_commander.description: Spawns 3 mini-drones that orbit and fire. Each does 25% of your damage.

sentinel_prime.name: Sentinel Prime
sentinel_prime.description: AI drone that targets the strongest enemy. Crit chance 30%. Heals you 2% per kill.

lucky_star_chip.name: Lucky Star Chip
lucky_star_chip.description: +25 luck. Rarity floor raised to Uncommon. +15% scrap bonus.
lucky_star_chip.flavor: Fortune favors the prepared... and the chippy.

berserker_matrix.name: Berserker Matrix
berserker_matrix.description: Damage scales with missing HP: up to +80% at 1 HP. -20% max shield.

temporal_loop.name: Temporal Loop
temporal_loop.description: On death, rewind 5 seconds (once per zone). +10% to all stats.
temporal_loop.flavor: This already happened. Or hasn't yet.
